rl.sqltrainer.gui

Class SQLTrainerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • rl.sqltrainer.gui.SQLTrainerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

     class SQLTrainerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This controller is responsible for the execution of those commands, which change the state of the application. It is also responsible for catching exceptions, coming up from below.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
